contact.title: SEND US YOUR REQUEST!
contact.callToAction: Do you have a question, concern, idea, feedback, problem?If you need assistance, please fill out the form below, and we'd be happy to help!
contact.radioOne: I have a question about the service.
contact.radioTwo: I'm a registered client and I need support.
contact.radioThree: I'm a counselor interested in joining.
contact.radioFour: I'm a registered counselor and I need support.
contact.radioSix: I'm interested in Inner Space for my organization.
contact.radioSeven: I have a billing related question.
contact.name: Full Name:
contact.info: Looking for more information or want to join Inner Space as a counselor? Submit your information and an Inner Space representative will follow up with you as soon as possible.

contactThankYou.title: THANK YOU!
contactThankYou.description: Your request has been sent, a Inner Space representative will get in contact with you through the email you provided as soon as possible.

careers.motto: Be a part of making people feel better.
careers.description: Our SEO software cuts through mountains of date to surface critical insights. We build and maintain systems that process massive amount of data (we're talking 35 trillion records per day and multiple petabytes of storage.) We model transparent and empathetic marketing for the world. We educate our community, making every effort to help them improve their skill. And we do it all by fastening a culture that encourages accountability, empathy, and transparency.
careers.subTitle: OUR HIRING PHILOSOPHY
careers.subDescription: To build the very best SEO tools, we need a workforce that reflects the diversity of our communities and customers. We want Inner Space to be a place where everyone feels welcome and engaged, bar none. It's our mission and promise to interview a diverse and representative slate of candidates before making an offer for our open roles.
careers.sendEmail: Please send us an email with the application title as the subject with an attached CV in PDF format!

signupthank.text1: Your Sign Up request has been received, you will soon receive a confirmation email.
signupthank.text2: Please follow the steps in the email to complete and activateyour account.

footer.spam: We will never spam you or share your email.

requirement.paragraph1: Over 10,000 people sign up on InnerSpace every day looking for a counselor to help with life’s challenges. InnerSpace can be your main source of income ('full time') or a supplement to your current work.
requirement.paragraph2: No need to worry about costs from acquiring clients, billing, support, or operations. Let us handle the fees and paperwork so you can focus on what you do best!
requirement.paragraph3: At InnerSpace, we understand that a work-life balance is crucial for your well-being as a therapist. You have the freedom to set your own hours and availability. Whether you prefer to counsel in the mornings, afternoons, or evenings, you can tailor your schedule to suit your lifestyle and needs.
requirement.li1: Licensed by a State Board to provide counseling
requirement.li2: Experience in counseling for adults, couples, and/or teens

team.title: We are a team of developers, Nice to meet you!!

buyticket.title: SELECT CARD
buyticket.paragraph1: Please select the card you want to buy the tickets with
buyticket.paragraph2: Click confirm to use the selected card to purchase
buyticket.thankstext: You purchase has been submitted, you should receive an email with the receipt soon.
buyticket.paragraph3: Or click checkout to use Stripe payment

paymentMethods.title: YOUR SAVED CARDS
paymentMethods.paragraph: We only support cards as a payment method at the moment!
paymentMethods.noCardsMessage: You have no saved cards, click the button below to add new card

password.wrongPasswordError: Incorrect old password entered. Please try again.

404.text: Page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL.
